From Ritual to Romance is a 1920 book written by Jessie L. Weston. The work is 
notable for being mentioned by T. S. Eliot in the notes to his poem, The Waste 
Land: Not only the title, but the plan and a good deal of the incidental symbolism 
of the poem were suggested by Miss Jessie L. Weston's book.
